title: ATLAS - TEST-ENV SANITY CHECKS POST REFRESH

task_list.instruction_title:
Check ATLAS on **TEST ENVIRONMENT** DATABASE + QSAM refresh

Execute 

SCRIPT :
By [nhprdtxb:/home/migsup/tools/02_Ctrl_refresh.ksh](http://nhprdtxb/home/migsup/tools/Ctrl_refresh.ksh) **TEST ENVIRONMENT**

In case of difficulty with the script, execute :
1. SQL Query : count (*)  from T_TRA_DET t  where code_chain_0195 = '17' 
count (*)  from T_TRA_DET t  where code_chain_0195 = '32' 
on the 2 servers

2. SQL Query : for check the last date process in T_COMPANY :
Select t.date_process_last_0143 from NHDBO.t_company t Where t.nbr_co_0143 = 211

3. Access control for QSAM fileson the 2 servers 
piquet@[axvgvatxbsit01p:/files/data/P92/](http://axvgvatxbsit01p/files/data/P92/) $ wc -l F92E.QSAM 5260 F92E.QSAM
Check ATLAS on **TEST ENVIRONMENT **COMPONENTS VERSION refresh
Check ATLAS on **TEST ENVIRONMENT **SYSTÈME DATE = Cutover Date
Check ATLAS on **TEST ENVIRONMENT **FTP CONFIGURATION, USER & PASSWORD (engine)
Clean all Log files for data **after** CUTOFF date
